thread.section_title: Tyresales Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Tyresales | tyresales.com.au
thread.title: Kym

author: Kym
title: Kym
text:
The whole process of buying online was great.
Easy to order, I had them sent to a local fitter, unfortunately it took 2.5hrs to fit them, but they were pretty busy, so I spose that cant be helped.
I chose Goodyear Eagles after researching them on the internet.
Nice price, nice looking tyre, nice pattern, but very soft tyres with thin side walls. You can press your thumb on the side wall and the top of the tyre will bulge up.
Cornering on Goodyear Eagles tends to make your car float around , feeling a bit unsafe. So I would recommend checking out the tyres you want in person from your local tyre shop, then order them from Tyresales. You wont beat Tyresales prices.
